title: China Mobile Plans to Raise $7.64 Billion Through Shanghai Listing
sub_head: The mobile operator’s offering would be one of the largest equity fundraisings so far this year
body:
China Mobile Ltd. is planning to raise $7.64 billion through a listing in Shanghai, which would be one of the largest equity fundraisings so far this year.
China Mobile’s stock offering comes after it and domestic rivals China Telecom Corp. and China Unicom (Hong Kong) Ltd. lost appeals against being delisted from the New York Stock Exchange.
